BR_text.BRdescription:
The instructions for installing mxnet master branch is incorrect.
 <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started?version=master&platform=linux&language=python&environ=pip&processor=cpu>https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started?version=master&platform=linux&language=python&environ=pip&processor=cpu</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5545640/71938317-ddbe9700-3163-11ea-8b4a-12dacc700b1d.png></denchmark-link>
 
 It should only show the ones with --pre suffix
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/aaronmarkham>@aaronmarkham</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
How did you arrive at the  version URL? It's not linked from the <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started>https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started</denchmark-link>
  page

comments_1.comment_text: There is a drop-down list for "MXNet version", and i selected "Master"

comments_2.comment_text: Thanks. I didn't realize that this dropdown list exists. There seems to be no UI element indicating the existence of the dropdown prior to hovering over the version number.

comments_3.comment_text:
The content looks fine in here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blame/master/docs/static_site/src/_includes/get_started/linux/python/cpu/pip.md>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blame/master/docs/static_site/src/_includes/get_started/linux/python/cpu/pip.md</denchmark-link>
 
 This is probably some javascript bug in here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/docs/static_site/src/assets/js/options.js>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/docs/static_site/src/assets/js/options.js</denchmark-link>
 
 Never been a fan of these conditional selectors... seems like they're always breaking.

comments_4.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/aaronmarkham>@aaronmarkham</denchmark-link>
  what's the alternative solution you're proposing?

comments_6.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/aaronmarkham>@aaronmarkham</denchmark-link>
  <denchmark-link:https://github.com/eric-haibin-lin>@eric-haibin-lin</denchmark-link>
  Above PR fixed this issue, preview link attached, please feel free to verify.
